text: James P. "Jim" White (October 4, 1942 â€“ January 15, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the New Mexico Senate from 2016 until his death. White was a member of the New Mexico House of Representatives from 2009 to 2015. White was a member of the Republican Party. White died on January 15, 2021 in Albuquerque, New Mexico at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official page at the New Mexico Legislature * Campaign site * * James White at Ballotpedia * James White at the National Institute on Money in State Politics Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the New Mexico Legislature Category:Politicians from New Mexico Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Albuquerque, New Mexico
title: James White (New Mexico politician)
